entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
